name: Idea Labs Consulting
description:
Idea Labs Consulting is a business consultant and business coach focusing on start-ups, small and medium businesses located in the Austin area. Our team is comprised of experienced entrepreneurs, technical experts and business professionals that have the experience, skill set and know-how to solve a wide range of business problems.
Each member of our team brings a minimum of five to ten years of experience in their specific vertical and many have started businesses or worked with start-ups in the past.
